name: UniTesting Software Testing
overview:
UniTesting is a professional and independent software testing company, headquarter and marketing department based in United States, and Test Solution Center and Teams in China. UniTesting dedicates to provide professional software testing services to clients, including Software Testing, Web Application Testing, Mobile Device Testing, Testing Consulting and Offshore Software Testing Solution Center operation.

UniTesting has a whole set of Test Solutions and Sophisticated Test Management Methodologies. During the 8 years development, UniTesting has grown to the professional software testing company, which from the 6 experts increased to 150 professional staff. Moreover, we are very proud of the every engineer’s ability and high sensitive toward to quality management. Facing various kinds of clients in various projects, UniTesting are trying to create more value for our clients with the professional software testing technology rich experiences and rigorous testing management.
